info.title: E-Mall API
info.description: A simple Web API build based on ASP.NET Core 3.1

post.summary: Verify the combination of email and password to grant user access to use E-Mall.

requestBody.description: Provides the necessary email and password combination for authentication

post.summary: Take input from user to register a new account

requestBody.description: Provide necessary information for registering a new user in the database

post.summary: Accepts a combination of user ID, current password and new password for password change.

get.summary: Retrieve all the items in the shopping cart of a specific user.
Retrive the total number of items in a user's shopping cart.
Retrieve the details of a specific cart item based on user ID and product ID.
Retrieve the details of a specific cart item based on cart item ID.

post.summary: Add an item to a user's shopping cart.

put.summary: Update an item (e.g. count) in user's shopping cart.

delete.summary: Remove an item from user's shopping cart.

get.summary: Retrieve all existing categories in the database.

post.summary: Add a new category to the database. This checks for duplicate category name.

put.summary: Update an existing category in the database. This checks for duplicate category name.

delete.summary: Remove an existing category from database.

get.summary: Get all orders of a specific status.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Order status, e.g. Approved, Processing, Shipped, Complete, Cancelled

schema.description: Order status, e.g. Approved, Processing, Shipped, Complete, Cancelled

get.summary: Get all orders of a specific status for a specific user.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Order status, e.g. Approved, Processing, Shipped, Complete, Cancelled

schema.description: Order status, e.g. Approved, Processing, Shipped, Complete, Cancelled

get.summary: Retrieve a specific order and its order items.

post.summary: Create an order from a user's shopping cart upon place order.

get.summary: Get all products from the database.

post.summary: Add a new product to the database.

get.summary: Get a specific product from the database.

put.summary: Update an existing product in the database.

delete.summary: Mark a product as not available instead of truly deleting it.

Get the details of a specific user.
